info.name: Contact Us Module
info.description: API endpoints for contact form management including creating inquiries, viewing submissions, and updating status

body.raw:
{
  "fullName": "John Doe",
  "phoneNumber": "+1234567890",
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "address": "123 Main Street, City, State 12345",
  "parentCategoryId": "category-uuid-here",
  "serviceId": "service-uuid-here",
  "status": "PENDING",
  "images": [
    "https://example.com/image1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/image2.jpg"
  ],
  "message": "I need help with my phone screen repair. The screen is cracked and not responding to touch."
}

response.name: Success Response
